description: Try our easy to follow Hot Roasted Cabbage recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hot Roasted Cabbage Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs flat leaf parsley leaves, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200°C. Cut 1 small cabbage (about 900g) into 8 wedges. Place in a roasting pan cut sides up.
Whisk cup olive oil, 2 tbs grain mustard, 1 tbs red wine vinegar, 2 chopped eschallots and 1 tbs each chopped sage and parsley together. Spoon evenly over wedges.

Cut 4 streaky bacon rashers in half and wrap a piece over each wedge. Season with salt and pepper. Add cup water or vegetable stock to pan. Roast for 35-40 minutes or until cabbage is tender and golden.
Serve drizzled with a little extra oil and sprinkle with 1 tbs chopped flat leaf parsley leaves.
